argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrinitorngc.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 2 |  | zrinitorngc.c | |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | zrinitorngc.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( Ring \ NzRing ) ) |
| 4 |  | zrinitorngc.e | |- ( ph -> Z e. U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_zrinitorngc | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( InitO ` C ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_zrtermorngc | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( TermO ` C ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_rngccat | |- ( U e. V -> C e. Cat ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_eldifad | |- ( ph -> Z e. Ring ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ringrng | |- ( Z e. Ring -> Z e. Rng ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Z e. Rng ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_elind | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 7, 1 | #P_rngcbas | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` C ) = ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 8, 10, 16 | #P_iszeroo | |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> ( Z e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ Z e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 5, 6, 17 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( ZeroO ` C ) ) |
